She made a misterious smile and said "Follow me... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: R. Dahl, Symphony is a HIM, not a HER.  Oh well, I wouldn't 
doubt
> anybody mistaking my characters for the opposite gender, the names 
can mix
> you up.  People have mistaken my characters for the opposite sex 
before,
> they have even roleplayed them like the opposite sex! *Glares at 
Yanshosh*
> 
> ::Triggerhappy/Symphony/Orchestra::
> 
>         Triggerhappy got up, and fired 3 shots from Blowpipe at 
Firearm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Symphony tries to think how he can escape from Drag Strip.  
But too
> late, Symphony's body went flying back as he was hit by Drag Strip.
> Symphony quickly got up, and ran out of the way, then he fired 22 
machine
> gun rounds at Drag Strip, hoping to damage the speeding car.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Orchestra nods.
> 
>        "Yes, I must have practice in battle!  You, you can be my 
sparring
> partner!" He said.
> 
>        Orchestra walked quickly off towards the training room, 
although he
> had no idea where it was.
